member.name: T:StyleMerge.RuleTuple
member.summary: A selector, with specificity, and declarations.

member.name: T:StyleMerge.Inliner
member.summary: The primary entry point of this library. Use "ProcessHtml" for all your email inlining needs.

member.name: M:StyleMerge.Inliner.ProcessHtml(System.String)
member.summary: Accepts a string of HTML and produces a string of HTML with styles inlined.

member.name: T:StyleMerge.InliningException
member.summary: Indicates an issue with the HTML where we cannot parse it, or we are unable to handle a rule defined by the CSS to be inlined.
